normalised: Are you even doing it right if you aren't deep-diving into your follower analytics? Social media is more than just posting pretty pictures of your chai and samosas! Experts are saying follower analytics are key to influencer marketing success, especially in a crowded market like India. Doctor Sharma from I I M-Bangalore emphasized at a recent webinar, "Knowing who is following you, what they like, and when they're active is crucial for optimizing content. It's not just about vanity metrics anymore!" Think beyond just the number of followers. Are they engaging? Are they from your target demographic, maybe interested in handcrafted sarees from Kanchipuram or organic farming in Kerala? Tools are readily available to analyze everything from engagement rates to audience demographics (age, location, interests!). Knowing that a large chunk of your followers are Gen Z from Delhi interested in sustainable fashion lets you tailor your content and partner with the right brands. Investing in follower analytics can boost your R O I, maybe even help you afford that new two thousand square feet apartment in Mumbai! Stop guessing, start knowing! Stop posting generic content, start connecting! It's time to understand your audience better than your own family. Trust me, your bank balance (and future collaborations worth rupees five lakhs!) will thank you.
